[Incredible Initiative](/Feats.aspx?ID=794) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

---

You react more quickly than others can. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.
name: Incredible Initiative
